nodes.text: Anooba Press was a publishing company that operated during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The company was a subsidiary of Tuvunna, Inc and it was based within Suite 44800 of the property 830-303 Satele Shan Boulevard, in the Azda Cluster region of the planet Coruscant. At some point, the company published Making a Killing, a memoir of the famed bounty hunter and leader of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, Cradossk. The company's logo consisted of a silhouette of an Anooba, a dangerous predator from the planet Tatooine.
